definition: lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: He's a real bloke - look at the size of his muscles.
sentences.chinese: 他真是个大块头，你看他的肌肉块儿多大。

sentences.english: This is a small woman while that is a big man.
sentences.chinese: 这个是小女人，而那却是个大块头男人。

sentences.english: Today, while at work, a rather large woman came in and ordered a cheeseburger.
sentences.chinese: 今天上班时，一个大块头女人进来点了个吉士汉堡。

sentences.english: He was a massive black giant and I was a pudgy little redhead.
sentences.chinese: 他是个大黑块头，而我是个红头发的小矮胖子。

sentences.english: He was a big man, clean-shaven, and his head was shaven too.
sentences.chinese: 他是个大块头，不蓄须，他的头发也剃光了。

sentences.english: His brawny strength is evident from his big muscles.
sentences.chinese: 瞧他那肌肉的块头就知道他力大无比。

sentences.english: And her powerful right arm sends her fist crashing into the large girl's mouth and nose.
sentences.chinese: 然后抡起有力的右拳砸向了那个大块头女孩的鼻梁骨。

sentences.english: In that small room, he seemed even bigger than I remembered him.
sentences.chinese: 他的块头似乎显得比我记的更大了。

sentences.english: Also, Wade obviously is smaller than James and his top speed is slightly slower.
sentences.chinese: 韦德的块头也明显比詹姆斯小，他的最佳速度也稍慢。

sentences.english: Dele is a big unit, so it's unfortunate.
sentences.chinese: 戴勒是个大块头，所以这很不幸。

sentences.english: Go figure, two big guys with small hands.
sentences.chinese: 想象一下，两个手很小的大块头。

sentences.english: Without a word, the larger gangster followed.
sentences.chinese: 那个大块头二话没说，跟着走了过去。

sentences.english: This body shape is usually bigger up top and smaller on the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 这种体型的人通常上半身块头较大而下半身比例稍小。

sentences.english: This was a rather corpulent farmer.
